docs.abstract: Newly released documents from former Pres Bill Clinton's library provide fresh look at his later years in office even as his wife Hillary Rodham Clinton now seeks White House post herself; documents transcribe phone calls and meetings between Clinton and then British Prime Min Tony Blair.

docs.snippet: The Obama administration has to make clear to its leaders that nukes won’t make it safe....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration has to make clear to its leaders that nukes won’t make it safe.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Profs Victor Cha and Robert L Gallucci refutes North Korea's belief that maintaining nuclear weapons arsenal will protect it from outside attacks; holds North Korea must recognize ways in which becoming nuclear power puts it at risk; urges United States and United Nations to intervene by increasing sanctions against North Korea, holding government officials accountable for crimes against humanity and pushing China to stem its support.
